endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: top_k

param_schema.title: Top K
param_schema.description: When decoding text, samples from the top k most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.description: When decoding text, samples from the top k most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.name: top_p

param_schema.title: Top P
param_schema.description: When decoding text, samples from the top p percentage of most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.description: When decoding text, samples from the top p percentage of most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: Write me a poem about Machine Learning.

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: Write me a poem about Machine Learning.
param_schema.description: Prompt to send to the model.

parameters.description: Prompt to send to the model.

parameters.name: temperature

param_schema.title: Temperature
param_schema.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic, 0.75 is a good starting value.

parameters.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic, 0.75 is a good starting value.

parameters.name: max_new_tokens

param_schema.title: Max New Tokens
param_schema.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A word is generally 2-3 tokens

parameters.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A word is generally 2-3 tokens

parameters.name: min_new_tokens

param_schema.title: Min New Tokens
param_schema.description: Minimum number of tokens to generate. To disable, set to -1. A word is generally 2-3 tokens.

parameters.description: Minimum number of tokens to generate. To disable, set to -1. A word is generally 2-3 tokens.

parameters.name: repetition_penalty

param_schema.title: Repetition Penalty
param_schema.description: A parameter that controls how repetitive text can be. Lower means more repetitive, while higher means less repetitive. Set to 1.0 to disable.

parameters.description: A parameter that controls how repetitive text can be. Lower means more repetitive, while higher means less repetitive. Set to 1.0 to disable.
